scripts.lint: npm --prefix be run lint && npm --prefix fe run lint && npx --yes @redocly/cli@latest lint --config .redocly.yaml docs/architecture/openapi.yaml
scripts.format: npm --prefix be run format && npm --prefix fe run format
scripts.test:be:log:clean: npm run test:be > test-be.log 2>&1 && node clean-logs.js test-be.log
scripts.test:fe:log:clean: npm run test:fe > test-fe.log 2>&1 && node clean-logs.js test-fe.log
scripts.lint:log:clean: npm run lint > lint.log 2>&1 && node clean-logs.js lint.log
scripts.format:log:clean: npm run format > format.log 2>&1 && node clean-logs.js format.log
scripts.be:seed:dev: npm --prefix be run seed:wiki:dev && npm --prefix be run seed:courses:dev
scripts.docker:seed:wiki: docker compose exec api npm run seed:wiki
scripts.docker:seed:courses: docker compose exec api npm run seed:courses
scripts.docker:db:host: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.db-host.yml up -d db
